text: A rack card is a document used for commercial advertising, frequently in convenience stores, hotels, landmarks, restaurants, rest areas and other locations that enjoy significant foot traffic.The Importance of Creating a Rack Card for Your Lodging Establishment Rack cards are typically 4 by 9 inches in size and sport high-impact graphic design. ==References== ==See also== *Marketing communications ==External links== *93 Outstanding Rack Card Design Examples Category:Advertising
title: Rack card
